sections.title: 10 Experts Behind Your Immigration Success
paragraphs: A multidisciplinary team focused on compliance, clarity, and outcomes.

sections.title: Expert roles
paragraphs: Builds the visa roadmap and evaluates eligibility, risks, and alternatives.
Monitors policy updates and verifies legal accuracy across all documents.
Manages translations, apostilles, and evidence packages.
Prepares appointment packets and submission timelines.
Coordinates in-country registration and appointment readiness.
Supports tax ID registration, banking, and local onboarding.
Guides housing, healthcare, and school planning.
Audits each case for missing items and timing issues.
Provides milestone updates and keeps timelines on track.
Provides local insights for each Brazilian state and city.

sections.title: Meet the team
paragraphs: Our multidisciplinary experts coordinate every stage of your immigration journey.
